title: Metallica Compile 245 Unreleased Tracks for New Load Reissue
description: Three live albums and dozens more demos and alternate versions make up the sprawling box set
author: Jazz Monroe
excerpt: Three live albums and dozens more demos and alternate versions make up the sprawling box set
text: Metallica have remastered their 1996 album, Load, for a 301-song reissue that includes 245 unreleased tracks. Within the complete box set are 15 CDs of demos, rarities, outtakes, alternate versions, and three full live albums; a 128-page book; four DVDs including concert, studio, and TV footage; and various merch knickknacks, along with the remastered album on a double-LP. The full version of “The Outlaw Torn”—originally abridged to fit on the album—also features for the first time. A standalone 3xCD set comprising 41 songs is also available. Check out the 233-song tracklist for the digital box set below. All the formats are out June 13 via Blackened.Load (Remastered Deluxe Box Set):01 Ain’t My Bitch (Remastered)02 2 X 4 (Remastered)03 The House Jack Built (Remastered)04 Until It Sleeps (Remastered)05 King Nothing (Remastered)06 Hero of the Day (Remastered)07 Bleeding Me (Remastered)08 Cure (Remastered)09 Poor Twisted Me (Remastered)10 Wasting My Hate (Remastered)11 Mama Said (Remastered)12 Thorn Within (Remastered)13 Ronnie (Remastered)14 The Outlaw Torn (Remastered)01 Intro Jam (Live at Irvine Meadows Amphitheatre, Irvine, CA - html:
Metallica have remastered their 1996 album, Load, for a 301-song reissue that includes 245 unreleased tracks. Within the complete box set are 15 CDs of demos, rarities, outtakes, alternate versions, and three full live albums; a 128-page book; four DVDs including concert, studio, and TV footage; and various merch knickknacks, along with the remastered album on a double-LP. The full version of “The Outlaw Torn”—originally abridged to fit on the album—also features for the first time. A standalone 3xCD set comprising 41 songs is also available. Check out the 233-song tracklist for the digital box set below. All the formats are out June 13 via Blackened.

Load (Remastered Deluxe Box Set):

01 Ain’t My Bitch (Remastered)
02 2 X 4 (Remastered)
03 The House Jack Built (Remastered)
04 Until It Sleeps (Remastered)
05 King Nothing (Remastered)
06 Hero of the Day (Remastered)
07 Bleeding Me (Remastered)
08 Cure (Remastered)
09 Poor Twisted Me (Remastered)
10 Wasting My Hate (Remastered)
11 Mama Said (Remastered)
12 Thorn Within (Remastered)
13 Ronnie (Remastered)
14 The Outlaw Torn (Remastered)
